column1: #Text=DISCOVERY OF A RIBBON SOCIETY IN BELFAST.
#Text=Such is the heading of the subjoined paragraph, which we copy from the Belfast Commercial Chronicle of yesterday.

#Text=The announcement, however, though of a nature sufficiently alarming, will, we are persuaded, surprise no person practically acquainted with the actual condition of Ireland at the present moment.
#Text=The Ribbon conspiracy has, it now appears, extended itself through the length and breadth of the island.
#Text=No portion of the country is free from the pernicious contagion.
#Text=Even in the extreme north, hitherto the abode of peaceful industry, the monster has dared to raise its baneful head.
#Text=Let us hope, however, that it has only showed itself to ensure a speedy and effective crushing by the magisterial authorities.
#Text=The measures already taken, to bring about a Consummation so devoutly to be wished for, afford an assurance that the evil may be blasted in its bud.
#Text=Meanwhile, what will the sneerers at Captain Rowans evidence before the Lords committee say on this discovery ?
#Text=Is the Belfast, affair, also, a mere chimera is it, too, one of your so-called " Tory inventions" ?
#Text=Let the following circumstantial statement answer the question:— " Belfast.
